text: Allan Douglas Nicholson (April 26, 1936 – December 9, 1978) was a Canadian ice hockey left winger. Born in Estevan, Saskatchewan, he played in 19 games for the Boston Bruins and recorded one assist. ==Awards and achievements== *WHL Championship (1963 & 1964) ==External links== * *Obituary at LostHockey.com Category:1936 births Category:1978 deaths Category:Boston Bruins players Category:Canadian ice hockey left wingers Category:Ice hockey people from Saskatchewan Category:People from Estevan Category:Winnipeg Warriors (minor pro) players
title: Al Nicholson
